pageProduct.name: A2 Milk Powder Manuka Honey 400g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

We have combined the goodness of UMF™ 10+ Manuka honey from New Zealand with pure and natural a2 Milk™ for a delicious and calcium rich drink.

Warnings

Not suitable for children under 1 year of age.

Common Uses

A calcium rich drink, perfect for any time of day. Enjoy a glass when you wake or before you go to sleep.

Ingredients

a2 Milk™ whole milk powder (86%), 10+ UMF™ Manuka honey powder (6%), acacia gum, honeydew honey powder, bush honey powder, minerals (calcium), emulsifier (soy lecithin).
Contains milk and soy.

Directions

1. Prepare 200ml of warm drinking water.
2. Add four scoops (30g) of powder to the water and stir, whisk or shake until dissolved.
For a fuller flavoured milk drink add extra powder. Reconstituted milk can be enjoyed warm immediately after preparation or stored in the refrigerator to chill before serving.
